legalStructureDescription: Define your business's legal structure and requirements.
requirementPlaceholder: Fill up the first requirement of your legal choice
furtherHelpText: If you need further help with this concept contact
financialPlannerInstructions: Please download your financial planner below, and fill up your monthly operational details
getStartedSubtitle: Your comprehensive guide to starting and growing your business
landingPageMotivation: 🚀 Turn Your Ideas into Reality: Let us help you craft marketing strategies and build a business that truly grows!
landingPageTip: 📝 Tip: Start by creating a business plan. Click the plan card to enter its workspace and begin building your vision.
resetInstructions: Enter your email to receive reset instructions
chosenBusinessIdeaQuestion: What is your chosen Business Idea?
businessIdeaPlaceholder: Insert your choice of a business idea
migrantQuestion: Are you a migrant or a refugee?
yearsHereQuestion: How long you have been here?
ownedBusinessQuestion: Have you owned a business before?
describeBusinessPlaceholder: Describe your business (type, services/products, years managed, financial size)
confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this plan? This action cannot be undone.
footerText: Â© {{year}} Value Nation. All rights reserved.
continueJourney: Continue your business development journey by exploring the following sections:
name: Name
listSkillsExpertise:
list the skills and expertise you have
-jobs you have done in the past
- things you are really good at
enterSkillNewLine: Enter each skill on a new line
listHobbiesPassions:
list top of:
- your hobbies and passions?
- things you enjoy doing the most?
enterPassionNewLine: Enter each passion/interest on a new line
listTopicsCare: List topics or issues you care about
enterValueGoalNewLine: Enter each value/goal on a new line
listPotentialBusinessIdeas: List your potential business ideas, considering your skills, passions, and values.
enterNoteNewLine: Enter each note on a new line
addMorePersonaInfoLabel: Add more Persona Information (Education, interests, social media favorite etc.)
identifyCustomerPainPoints: Identify and prioritize customer pain points
personalNotesPlaceholder: Empty space for users to add any personal notes.
uniqueSolutionFeaturesQuestion: Considering the discussion we had, list three features that can make your solution unique in the market?
goalMessageQuestion: 1. What is the Goal/Message I want to deliver?
audienceQuestion: 2. Who is my Audience for this campaign?
formatPlaceholder: Audio, written, Images, video, physical, graphs
bigSolutionQuestion: What is my business big Solution?
enterMarketSimpleQuestion: How can I enter the market in the most simple way?
featureEnhanceSolution: Ability to enhance, change the solution
useWhatIHave: To create this simple solution I will use what I have:
getWhatINeed: ...and I will get what I need:
questionsProveWorks: Questions you need to be answered to prove your solution works?
questionHowMuchPay: How much are people willing to pay?
questionFeatureMattersMost: What feature, size, color, format matters most?
questionWhenNeedMost: When do they need it most (day/week/month/year)?
questionWherePreferBuy: Where would they prefer to buy it?
questionBiggestFrustrations: What are their biggest frustrations with current options?
findAnswersQuestion: How will you find answers to those questions?
planMoveForwardQuestion: What is your plan to move forward towards the (Big Solution) using the same framework above?
bigSolutionPlaceholder: Describe the big vision of your future business!
thingsNeedPlaceholder: List things you must get to start
planMoveForwardPlaceholder: How would you imagine your business next few steps to grow and reach the bigger plan?
